div.p: This is a recipie from my grandmother. We always ate it on Sundays even in the summer, so we could have Christmas all year long. It’s just the best thing to eat at Christmas with your family..

p.span: Preheat the oven at 175 degrees. Mix the butter with the sugar and the salt until it is foamy. Add the eggs one after one. Mix the Flour with the baking powder. When it is properly mixed just put it together and mix it up to a dough. Fill the dough into a heart-shaped form. After that just put it into the oven for 1 hour at 175 degrees. In the meantime pound the rum together with the powdered sugar and put it into the refrigerator. After the one hour the heart-shaped form should be cool down, so that the cake can be put on a plate. Brush the cake with the bulk from the refrigerator.
